lines.text:
[singing]
Now that old hound dog is an awful pest. He barks so much I get no rest. Homely as an old mud fence, that old hound dog just got no sense. Oh doggy, you're gonna get your lumps. Oh doggy, you're gonna get some bumps. Oh doggy...
She remi - I say, she reminds me of Paul Revere's ride. A little light in the belfry.
Gal reminds me of the highway between Fort Worth and Dallas. No curves.

[Prissy offers him a melon]
For ME?

[starts dancing with the melon, teasing Dawg]
This cluck's off her onion.

[sees Prissy on the barn]
Now what's that skinny old hen doing up on the barn? She must have flipped her wig and thinks she's a weathervane.

[jumps off, trying to kill herself]
WHAMADOODLE! She jumped off!

[after catching her]
Now what's the big idea of diving with no water? Diving's ok, but you just gotta have water!
